meanings.definition: One who outlives another person or event.
meanings.sent1: The surviver of the shipwreck was the only one left on the island.
meanings.sent2: The last surviver of the ancient civilization passed away peacefully.
meanings.sent3: The surviver of the game was crowned the champion.
meanings.sent4: She was the lone surviver in the battle of good versus evil.
meanings.sent5: The surviver's story inspired many to never give up.

meanings.definition: To remain alive or in existence after a dangerous or difficult situation.
meanings.sent1: The plant managed to surviver through the harsh winter.
meanings.sent2: Despite the odds, he was determined to surviver the storm.
meanings.sent3: The little seedling tried its best to surviver in the rocky soil.
meanings.sent4: She had to fight hard to surviver the illness that struck her.
meanings.sent5: The old tree continued to surviver despite the lightning strike.

meanings.definition: A person who continues to function or prosper despite adversity.
meanings.sent1: She was a true surviver, always finding a way to overcome challenges.
meanings.sent2: The community hailed him as a surviver for rebuilding after the disaster.
meanings.sent3: The surviver of the office prank laughed it off and planned a comeback.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, she was known as a surviver for her resilience.
meanings.sent5: The little plant in the desert was a true surviver, blooming against all odds.
